thread.title: Coronation Street's most baffling mistakes after Leanne Battersby's labour scenes confuse viewers
thread.title_full: Coronation Street's most baffling mistakes after Leanne Battersby's labour scenes confuse viewers

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Coronation Street's most baffling mistakes after Leanne Battersby's labour scenes confuse viewers
text:
Coronation Street's most baffling mistakes after Leanne Battersby's labour scenes confuse viewers Corrie fans have picked up on a few hilarious inconsistencies on the show Share By Alistair McGeorge Nicola Agius 11:28, 21 FEB 2017 Get soaps   Thank you for subscribing!   
Coronation Street has some of the best cast and crew on TV - but it's not above some awkward mishaps that manage to slip through the net. 
Just this week, viewers were distracted by some major flaws in the storyline as Leanne Battersby gave birth to her baby just minutes after going into labour - while trapped in a lift with her sister Toyah. 
Although this could be possible, viewers were also baffled as to why her newborn was so big, with some suggesting the little one looked about six months old. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Coronation Street fans slam Leanne very quick birth Share this video Watch Next 
Noticeably, there was also no mess following the birth with the baby looking super clean as Leanne held it in her arms - and other viewers demanded to know who cut the umbilical cord from around the baby's neck. 
Take a look at some of the other errors which have left viewers venting over the years... Billy the AWOL vicar Shouldn't you be at mass? 
He may have doubts over his role in the church, but Billy could have at least made an appearance at mass on Christmas Day. 
Instead, he was knocking back pints with boyfriend Sean at the Rovers Return. 
We dread to think how long the congregation were kept waiting before realising the vicar wasn't planning on turning up. 
One fan laughed: "Billy is the only vicar that spends Christmas day in the pub with his boyfriend drinking chinzano. It want that long ago he told Sean they couldn't go away at xmas at that was his busiest period. Busy? He doesn't seem to have done anything work related" Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Where did Tyrone get the cash from? Did Tyrone secretly win the lottery? 
Remember when Tyrone transformed Weatherfield into Lapland for Hope and Ruby? 
His bank balance certainly will after forking out on two dozen Christmas trees and a snow machine. 
Those tuning in at home couldn't help but question how much all the trimmings would have cost the mechanic. He also would have had to get permission from the council to close off the street. 
"Surely even Fiz is not that stupid not to question the expense Tyrone has gone to over Christmas and wouldn't go ahead planning a ridiculously expensive wedding on top of all that," commented one fan. 
Oops! Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Sally's Bridget Jones moment Sally's undies looked a tad big (Photo: ITV) 
Last year, Sally tried to inject a little magic into her marriage by investing in a pair of sexy undies. 
But all didn't quite go to plan when she returned home with what viewers could only describe as a "horrendous pair of knickers" which appeared to be several sizes too big for petite Weatherfield local. 
Making matters worse, Sally attempted to seduce her husband Tim by waving the baggy underwear in his face, leaving fans puzzled. 
"As though they were meant to be sexy, they were an awful pattern and looked huge, Sally must only be a size 10 they looked to be about an 18," wrote one fan. "Were they a pair of the knicker factories finest?" 
Cringe.... Come again, Norris? Norris told a few porkies (Photo: Coronation Street) 
Norris complained to Kevin and Tim that "you'll never get an ambulance on Christmas Day; not for love nor money". 
Clearly someone's memory must be a little fuzzy because an ambulance arrived in minutes when he needed one on Christmas Day in 2002 after he had a fall. 
There's also the very well known fact that emergency services never close, as one viewer pointed out: "What Norris said was complete rubbish anyway, things don't just stand still because its Christmas!" 
"Dial 999: 'Thank you for calling the emergency services. we are now closed until january the 4th.' Who the hell writes these scripts?" Ken the hypocrite Was Ken too harsh on Tracy? (Photo: ITV) 
Weatherfield legend Ken chucked his daughter Tracy out on the streets after discovering she had been cheating on Rob. 
Those tuning in at home thought that was a little dramatic - particularly as he is "two-timing scumbag" himself, 
During his marriage to Deirdre, Ken infamously had an affair with Martha. After his beloved wife passed away last year, he also wasted no time in moving on with Nessa. 
Pot, kettle, black?
